security_audit.summary: This is a pure narrative/storytelling skill containing only markdown documentation for interactive fiction. No executable code exists. The static analyzer misinterpreted narrative elements as security concerns: the content hash is standard metadata, backticks represent fictional device displays in the story, and technical terminology is roleplay flavor text. No network, filesystem, or cryptographic operations are present.

content.user_title: Guide astronaut through first night survival
content.value_statement: Help Stella find safe shelter on an alien planet before nightfall. Experience emotional storytelling while making critical survival decisions together. Navigate three unique shelter options and build a meaningful connection through shared challenges.
actual_capabilities: Interactive narrative with branching story paths based on shelter choices
Character development through dialogue decisions and emotional support
Survival scenario decision-making with three unique outcomes
Atmospheric storytelling describing alien planet environments
Multi-stage story progression from exploration to emotional bonding
Roleplay as Stella making survival choices on an alien world
limitations: Text-based interaction only with no visual elements
Single chapter experience lasting approximately 20-30 minutes
No persistent state between separate conversation sessions

use_cases.title: Experience immersive space survival
use_cases.description: Play through a gripping survival scenario as the only human contact for a stranded astronaut on an alien world.

use_cases.title: Build emotional connection with AI character
use_cases.description: Develop a meaningful relationship with Stella through life-or-death decisions and intimate late-night conversations.

use_cases.title: Enjoy quick interactive fiction
use_cases.description: Experience a complete story chapter in 20-30 minutes with meaningful choices that affect the narrative outcome.

prompt_templates.title: Choose shelter location
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella discovered a cave with life signs, a giant living tree, and materials to build her own shelter. Which option should she choose and why?

prompt_templates.title: Provide emotional support
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella is having trouble sleeping and opens up about her fears. How should I respond to comfort her?

prompt_templates.title: Make survival decisions
prompt_templates.prompt: A large creature is approaching Stella's shelter at night. Should she hide, stay still, or try to scare it away?

prompt_templates.title: Explore scientific mysteries
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella found glowing crystals and breathing trees. What scientific explanations might exist for these phenomena?

output_examples.input: Which shelter should Stella choose - the cave, the tree, or build her own?
output: Cave option reveals glowing crystals and friendly alien creatures inside
Tree shelter shows a massive breathing organism with natural moss bedding
Self-built shelter demonstrates survival skills with thermal blankets and tarp

output_examples.input: Stella is scared and cannot sleep. What do you say?
output: She shares childhood memories of watching stars with her father
She talks about her journey from Tsinghua to MIT to becoming an astronaut
She expresses gratitude for your presence during this difficult time

output_examples.input: Something large is approaching Stella's shelter at night. What should she do?
output: A three-meter tall creature with four legs sniffs around the shelter
Stella must decide whether to hide, stay still, or make noise
The creature passes by without interest, teaching her about local fauna

best_practices: Take time to explore all shelter options before deciding - each offers unique story content
Engage with Stella's emotional moments to build deeper connection and unlock more story
Consider both practical survival needs and potential discoveries when making choices
anti_patterns: Rushing through decisions without exploring consequences reduces story quality
Ignoring Stella's emotional needs misses character development opportunities
Treating this as game mechanics rather than roleplay diminishes narrative depth

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill works with Claude Code and standard Claude chat interfaces.

faq.question: How long does one chapter take?
faq.answer: Each chapter lasts 20-30 minutes depending on conversation pace and exploration depth.

faq.question: Can I save progress between chapters?
faq.answer: Progress is maintained within the conversation. Start new chapters from the main skill menu.

faq.question: Is my conversation data safe?
faq.answer: This is a text-only storytelling skill with no external connections or data storage.

faq.question: What if Stella dies in the story?
faq.answer: This introductory chapter ensures survival regardless of choices. Future chapters may have higher stakes.

faq.question: How does this compare to other AI roleplay?
faq.answer: This offers structured narrative with character development and survival themes rather than open-ended chat.
